description:
Seamless background video recording – ad-free, with customizable options.

FadCam is a powerful background video recorder that works even with the screen off — ideal for discreet and uninterrupted recording.

What's New:

  • Redesigned UI with bottom sheet actions for sort and delete.
  • Audio toggle, bitrate control, and mic source selection.
  • Custom video bitrate, orientation, and 60/90fps support.
  • Auto-split large recordings and geotag videos with location data.
  • Thumbnails display index, duration, and file size.
  • Trash bin with restore and playback options.
  • Wide-angle lens detection and detailed "Video Info" menu.
  • 7+ themes including AMOLED and 15+ app icon styles.
